modName: Skyrim Exit Helgen Change Character Menu
summary: Allows you to change your character once you exit Helgen at the start of the game.
descriptionHtml:
This mod allows you to change your character once you exit Helgen at the start of the game just like in Oblivion when you were able to change your character before you exited the Imperial City Prison Sewers. This mod also works well with my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5327/?]Skyrim Quickstart[/url] mod since your able to change your character once you load the saved game. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1002/?]here[/url]

Requirements
Skyrim

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin, and bsa into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
